com.github.flowersinthesand.spheres

Interface App

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AppInside
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppProxy, DefaultApp

    public interface App
    Interface representing the Spheres application.

    A Spheres application is a realtime web application that consists of sockets and actions handling them and runs within a web server on JVM. An App instance is used to find and handle session which is a final interface for the application developer.

    Author:
    Donghwan Kim

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      App all(Action<? extends SessionBase> action)
      Retrieves all the session and executes the given action.
      App byId(String id, Action<? extends SessionBase> action)
      Finds the session whose the underlying socket has a given id and executes the given action.
      App byTag(String name, Action<? extends SessionBase> action)
      Finds the session whose the underlying socket has been tagged with the the specified tag name and executes the given action.
      void close()
      Closes the application
      App closeAction(Action<Void> action)
      Registers an action to be called when the application closes.
      App httpAction(Action<HttpExchange> action)
      Registers an action to be called when the HttpExchange is prepared.
      App sessionAction(Action<? extends SessionBase> action)
      Registers an action to be called when the Session is opened.
      App socketAction(Action<Socket> action)
      Registers an action to be called when the Socket is opened.
      App webSocketAction(Action<WebSocket> action)
      Registers an action to be called when the WebSocket is opened.

    • Method Detail

      • all

        App all(Action<? extends SessionBase> action)
        Retrieves all the session and executes the given action. See, SerializableAction if you are going to cluster the application.

      • byId

        App byId(String id,
       Action<? extends SessionBase> action)
        Finds the session whose the underlying socket has a given id and executes the given action. See, SerializableAction if you are going to cluster the application.

      • byTag

        App byTag(String name,
        Action<? extends SessionBase> action)
        Finds the session whose the underlying socket has been tagged with the the specified tag name and executes the given action. See, SerializableAction if you are going to cluster the application.

      • httpAction

        App httpAction(Action<HttpExchange> action)
        Registers an action to be called when the HttpExchange is prepared.

      • webSocketAction

        App webSocketAction(Action<WebSocket> action)
        Registers an action to be called when the WebSocket is opened.

      • socketAction

        App socketAction(Action<Socket> action)
        Registers an action to be called when the Socket is opened.

      • sessionAction

        App sessionAction(Action<? extends SessionBase> action)
        Registers an action to be called when the Session is opened.

      • closeAction

        App closeAction(Action<Void> action)
        Registers an action to be called when the application closes.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the application
